Brief.name: Brief
Brief.description: Represents a marketing brief. A brief contains information that’s used for positioning and grounding a marketing campaign.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency type for the brief.

KeyMessage.description: The main idea or message that you want to deliver to your customers through the campaign that’s associated with the brief.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the brief was last referenced by a campaign.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the brief was last viewed.

TargetAudience.description: A description of the characteristics of the audience that you want to reach through the campaign that’s associated with this brief.
